text:
Was hungry for lunch and passed by this restaurant and happened to see their set lunch promo for $9.90. Decided to take settle lunch at this restaurant. Count my blessings, for $12.90, I ordered Fish and Chips and the Chicken Chop set meal which offers salad free-flow and mushroom soup free-flow.

The mushroom soup was delicious, better than some restaurants out there.

Chicken chop was fragrant and flavourful, really delicious. Fish and chips, the fish was soft, batter was not too thick and was easy on the palate.

On top of both salad and mushroom soup, there was ice cream free flow.

Really worth coming here when you're nearby and looking for something value for money.

This cafe is located on the ground floor of the Aqueen Hotel along Lavender Street.

This cafe serves very good tasting and large serving of westren food come with soup of the day, dessert and tea/coffee/soft drink at only SGD9.90 per person.

If you come in a group of 4, the 4th person is basically free!

Picture left to right Mushroom Soup, Grilled Chicken Chop in Black Pepper Sauce with Salad and Fries, Lamb Chop with Onion Sauce with blanched Cauliflower & Broccoli and Mashed Potato, Pan Fried Salmon with Salad and Mashed Potato.

These are the few dishes from their menu.

Located next to hotel Aqueen Lavender. Went here on sunday noon. Tried set lunch for $9.9++. Choose main dish from few options, comes with soup of the day, and free flow ice cream. Professional service and friendly staff. Highly recommended!

I found this unique piece of amazing and good food in the middle lavender. Located next to the Aqueen Hotel.

I had the set chicken shop 9++ buffet salat bar plus drink of your choice and ice cream bar all options refill just no the main dish.
Worth the price and food was good and good amount. Totally recommend this place

Went for weekday lunch set at 9.99

Small sitting area but comfortable, total seating space should be about 40pax

For set lunch of 9.99, you get a main course to choose from 5-6 choices (range from chicken chop, lamb, steak, salmon, and 1 more), a soup, and ice cream.

Add 3.99 will give access to salad bar and a drink (coffee n tea need to add a dollar)

Overall food quality is not bad, spread of salad bar is good. Considering all are refillable except for main dish, it is worth the price tag. Portion is good also.

Recommend to try out for a lunch if one is working near by.
